text: Greenhorn Mercenary
You helped the local people, for a cost.
Gained by completing your first local contract
Seasoned Mercenary
Folk are grateful for your assisstance even if it comes at a price.
Gained by completing 6 local contracts
Mercenary Hero
Bards sing of the great deeds of Bernhardt and his mercenary band
Gained by completing 11 local contracts
Mercenary of Renown
When people are in need, you are there. When you arrive at cities, people flock, chanting Grudgebringers! Grudgebringers! Grudgebringers!
Gained by completing 16 local contracts
Pioneer
You have drove out the foul forces, providing much needed homes to folk
Gained by returning settlement to Order factions
None Shall Remain
Cut them down to the last, every last one of them
Gained by returning 6 settlements to Order factions
Scourge of the Foul
The balance is slowy tipping, there is still a flicker of hope
Gained by returning 11 settlements to Order factions
Vanquisher of Evil
The Darkness trembles upon hearing of your approach
Gained by returning 16 settlements to Order factions
